content:
<rule id="embedded-cache-libraries-16000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <file filename="{*}redis{*}.jar"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Redis Cache library">
                    <description>
                        The application embeds the Redis client.
                    </description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Redis</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
